result.reason: Enabling multi-selection for bulk operations is a standard usability feature that significantly improves workflow efficiency.
result.approach: Enable MultiSelect property on the ConnectionTree control. Update the selection handling logic to support a collection of selected nodes (SelectedNodes) instead of a single node. Refactor context menu commands (Connect, Disconnect, etc.) to iterate through and apply actions to all selected connections.
